spec-kit-documentation.description: Documentation architecture using spec-kit format with YAML frontmatter and structured markdown files

ace-pattern-learning.description: Agentic Context Engineering pattern detection, validation, and evolution system

playbook-structure.description: Organized playbook directory structure with numbered domains and three-file format

version-controlled-learning.description: Git-based version control for learned patterns and playbooks with historical tracking

metadata-driven-documentation.description: Use of YAML frontmatter and structured metadata to organize and query documentation

separation-of-documentation-concerns.description: Split documentation into distinct files for pattern definition, implementation approach, and reflective analysis

confidence-based-curation.description: Filter and organize patterns based on confidence thresholds (e.g., 70% for constitution)

automated-knowledge-extraction.description: Automatically detect and document coding patterns from actual codebase analysis rather than manual documentation

evidence-based-learning.description: Validate patterns through test results and execution feedback before inclusion in playbooks

human-readable-automation.description: Generate documentation that is both machine-processable and human-friendly with emoji section headers and clear structure

iterative-refinement.description: Continuously evolve patterns through multi-epoch training and reflector analysis

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file paths and descriptions
